title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition – v1.0.449.0_64 + All DLCs + Bonus Content
body:

Companies: Eidos-Montreal, Nixxes Software

Shadow.of.the.Tomb.Raider.Definitive.Edition.Win7.Fix-CODEX

From NFO: Our previous crack had an issue starting on Windows 7, this will fix that.

  • https://pixeldrain.com/u/sbTgPjAD SOTTR_DE_CODEX_Win_7_Fix.rar
  • https://letsupload.io/4nL9p/SOTTR_DE_CODEX_Win_7_Fix.rar
  • https://multiup.org/download/094bc78048fbdc67665e5f78f30784b3/SOTTR_DE_CODEX_Win_7_Fix.rar

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Shadow.of.the.Tomb.Raider.Definitive.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-shadow.of.the.tomb.raider.definitive.edition.iso (30,736,482,304 bytes)
  • Shadow.of.the.Tomb.Raider.Definitive.Edition.Language.Pack-PLAZA (22.8 GB) applied over
  • Missing DLC files added, thanks to sam2k8!
  • Alternative Nemertingas emulator is available in NoDVD folder in case you have problems with CODEX one
  • Game version: v1.0.449.0_64; Bonus Content and all DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of language packs and bonus content
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 51.4 to 20.1~33.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes from 5 minutes on 16-threads CPU to 13 minutes on 4-threads CPU for any single language
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 57.9 GB
  • Use “language.changer.exe” in game root to change the game UI language
  • Audio language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

In Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition experience the final chapter of Lara’s origin as she is forged into the Tomb Raider she is destined to be. Combining the base game, all seven DLC challenge tombs, as well as all downloadable weapons, outfits, and skills, Shadow of the Tomb Raider Definitive Edition is the ultimate way to experience Lara’s defining moment.

New and recently updated features introduced in Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition are:

  • Upgraded NVIDIA DLSS to the latest version.
  • New improved shadow denoiser for use with ray traced shadows.
  • Updates to multiplayer infrastructure to use Epic Online Services.
  • Fixed specific compatibility issues with Intel GPU hardware.
  • Denuvo-less

Game Features

  • Survive and Thrive In the Deadliest Place on Earth: Master an unforgiving jungle setting in order to survive. Explore underwater environments filled with crevasses and deep tunnel systems.
  • Become One With the Jungle: Outgunned and outnumbered, Lara must use the jungle to her advantage. Strike suddenly and disappear like a jaguar, use mud as camouflage, and instill fear in enemies to sow chaos.
  • Discover Dark and Brutal Tombs: Tombs are more terrifying than ever before, requiring advanced traversal techniques to reach them, and once inside they are filled with deadly puzzles.
  • Uncover Living History: Discover a hidden city and explore the biggest hub space ever found in a Tomb Raider game.

You can skip downloading of language and bonus files or you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin (OST and wallpapers)
  • fg-selective-english.bin (also required for Korean users)
  • fg-selective-arabic.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin (both Simplified and Traditional Chinese included)
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-04).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS partially backwards compatible with my previous SotTR repack. You can rehash the following files to save up to 14.7 GB of traffic.

  • fg-02.bin
  • fg-optional-bonus-content.bin
  • fg-selective-arabic.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin

  • fg-selective-spanish.bin
